class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 28- June 24, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: PORT 311 is designed to interweave the arts and language acquisition. The students will be exposed to a vast array of meaningful artistic production, via the literary, performing, and visual arts. Students will further their linguistic competence through extensive practice in writing and speaking.
prerequisites: PORT 201 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
